amendment.description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to increase funding for the US African Development Foundation by $15 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A057) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A057) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
